name: Universität Leipzig
goal: Universität Leipzig, founded in 1409, has around 30,000 students. There are 14 faculties covering the Humanities, Social Sciences, Natural Sciences, Life Sciences and Medicine. This variety enables each scientist to make use of the knowledge of more than 400 professors. After the conversion to Bachelor/Master degress, the University currently offers around 156 degree programmes. In addition it offers many advanced Master and postgraduate programmes, plus distance learning courses.
euInitiatives: Initiatives regarding the implementation of H2020, Structural Fonds in the State of Saxony and Erasmus+ Programmes.
